definition: to urge/to press/to prompt/to rush sb/to hasten sth/to expedite
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Coumarin has been synthesized in Perkinreaction of acetic anhydride and salicylaldehydecatalyzed by anhydrous potassium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 用无水碳酸钾代替无水醋酸钠催化合成了香豆素。

sentences.english: The molecular sieve pretreated by alkali can improve the stability of catalysts obviously.
sentences.chinese: 分子筛预先经碱处理，能够明显改善催化剂稳定性。

sentences.english: Aim To study optimial technology for autogenesis -enzyme hydrolysis of total flavonoid glycoside in scutellaria.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黄芩自生酶催化水解总黄酮苷的工艺条件。

sentences.english: Thus, the Se contents in oyster can be measured by Catalytic-kinetic photometry.
sentences.chinese: 应用催化动力学光度法可以测定牡蛎中硒的含量。

sentences.english: Reaction pathway of cyclohexanone over these catalysts was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了环己酮在这类催化剂上双聚反应的机理。

sentences.english: The ability of clay minerals to catalyse decarboxylation has long been recognised.
sentences.chinese: 粘土矿物能催化脱羧基作用是早已认识到的问题。

sentences.english: At present, these problems are expected to be solved by using whole-cell catalyst technology.
sentences.chinese: 目前，采用全细胞催化等技术工艺有望解决这些难题。

sentences.english: EA is oxidized completely and no partially oxidized side-products are formed over the catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 乙酸乙酯在催化剂上完全被氧化且无副产物生成。

sentences.english: The pore structures of catalyst influence interparticle diffusion which mainly determines the effectiveness factor.
sentences.chinese: 催化剂的孔结构对有效因子有很大影响。

sentences.english: The major three-way catalysts and its properties were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了几种主要的三效催化剂及其应用情况。

sentences.english: Effective inhibitor of protein kinase C (PKC)-catalyzed histone phosphorylation.
sentences.chinese: 有效的PKC催化组蛋白磷酸化抑制剂。

sentences.english: Lipase N435 was screened as catalyst, and tert-butanol as solvent.
sentences.chinese: 筛选出脂肪酶N435作为催化剂，叔丁醇作为溶剂。

sentences.english: In this paper, a kind of new catalysts for olefins hydroformylation was studied.
sentences.chinese: 本论文研制了一种新型烯烃氢甲酰化催化剂。

sentences.english: A spectrophotometric method for determining rhenium content in Pt Re reforming catalysts is reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用分光光度法测定重整催化剂中铼含量的方法。

sentences.english: Low phosphor formula ensure the translator of ternary catalysis work normally.
sentences.chinese: 低磷配方确保三元催化转换器正常工作。

sentences.english: The silver oxide exhibits photoactived fluorescence.
sentences.chinese: 氧化银本身具有光催化的萤光。

definition: to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
(of alcohol) to ferment/(of a crisis) to be brewing/to mull over (an issue)/to hold exploratory discussions
to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
